name: Orbital Station - Diable Avionics
desc:
A coriolis space station, featuring moderate firepower and substancial fighter defenses.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Battlestation - Diable Avionics
desc:
A coriolis battle station, augmented with weapon batteries featuring heavy armaments and extensive fighter presence.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Starfortress - Diable Avionics
desc:
A coriolis starfortress that has been enhanced with ECM warfare modules and advanced Wanzer facilities.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.
